testcase.name: signup with valid data
testcase.system-out: Given user open the register page...........................................passed When user select the gender.................................................passed And insert personal data....................................................passed And insert the company name ,check on new sletter...........................passed And write the password with the confirmation of it..........................passed And click on the register button............................................passed Then user signed up successfully............................................passed

testcase.classname: user could login to the website
testcase.name: user could login with valid data
testcase.system-out: Given user select login from the top right bar and navigate to the login page.passed When user enter a valid email...............................................passed And enter a valid password..................................................passed And click on the login button...............................................passed Then user logged in successfully............................................passed

testcase.classname: user could login to the website
testcase.name: user forgot the password
testcase.system-out: Given user select login from the top right bar and navigate to the login page.passed When user enter a valid email...............................................passed And click on the forgot password anchor tag.................................passed And insert the email again..................................................passed And Click on the recover button.............................................passed Then message says that the mail sent successfully appeared..................passed

testcase.classname: logged user can switch between currencies

testcase.system-out: Given user select login from the top right bar and navigate to the login page.passed When user enter a valid email...............................................passed And enter a valid password..................................................passed And click on the login button...............................................passed Then user logged in successfully............................................passed When user click on the drop down menu in the top left and select the currency.passed

testcase.classname: logged user can search for any product
testcase.name: user search for any product by writing the name of it in the search bar
testcase.system-out: Given user select login from the top right bar and navigate to the login page.passed When user enter a valid email...............................................passed And enter a valid password..................................................passed And click on the login button...............................................passed Then user logged in successfully............................................passed When user write the product name in the search bar..........................passed And click on search button..................................................passed Then a new page that contain all products with that name will be displayed..passed

testcase.classname: logged user can search for any product
testcase.name: user search for any product by writing the SKU of it in the search bar

testcase.classname: logged user can select different tags

testcase.classname: logged user can add products to shopping cart
